scripts.win_debug: set NODE_ENV=debug&& set NODE_EXTRA_CA_CERTS=./ssl/root.pem&& set DEBUG=CustodianApi:*&&  nodemon ./bin/CustodianApi
scripts.win_forever_prod: set NODE_ENV=production&& set NODE_EXTRA_CA_CERTS=./ssl/root.pem&& set DEBUG= && forever start --id CustodianApi -o ./log/out.log -e ./log/err.log -c  node ./bin/CustodianApi
scripts.win_forever_dev: set NODE_ENV=development&& set NODE_EXTRA_CA_CERTS=./ssl/root.pem&& set DEBUG=CustodianApi:* && forever start --id CustodianApi -o ./log/out.log -e ./log/err.log -c  node ./bin/CustodianApi
scripts.forever_prod: NODE_ENV=production NODE_EXTRA_CA_CERTS=./ssl/root.pem forever start --id CustodianApi -o ./log/out.log -e ./log/err.log -c node ./bin/CustodianApi
scripts.forever_dev: NODE_ENV=development NODE_EXTRA_CA_CERTS=./ssl/root.pem forever start --id CustodianApi -o ./log/out.log -e ./log/err.log -c node ./bin/CustodianApi
scripts.win_ci_function_prod: set NODE_ENV=production&& set NODE_EXTRA_CA_CERTS=./ssl/root.pem&& set DEBUG= && node ./ci_tools/CICommand
scripts.win_ci_function_dev: set NODE_ENV=development&& set NODE_EXTRA_CA_CERTS=./ssl/root.pem&& set DEBUG= && node ./ci_tools/CICommand
